extendedInfo.description: Live departure board for buses in London.Data provided by Transport for London.(This app uses Google Analytics to report anonymous usage statistics which are used to improve the experience)

reviews.title: Good but missing stop
reviews.comment: Really like the app but what happened to \"shepherds bush station (c)\" ? It finds a, b and d, and LTFree finds all four standing in the same spt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Was brilliant... now doesn\'t work at all on my Samsung galaxy s. Never finds my location,  and nothing but blank screens on favourites already saved. Pity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Really good application... I don\'t need to wait for the bus, I go always on time....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bugs creeping in
reviews.comment: App gets more buggy with every update... Not showing bus stops that exist, dropping the wrong favourite stops when I unstar one, blank screens sometimes without any data...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why has it stopped working?
reviews.comment: A great idea but it won\'t pick up any bus stops now.  Have un installed it.  Shame.
reviews.author: Sarah Brown

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t always work but when it does it is very useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work!
reviews.comment: Does not find my location, and screen goes black when you press on saved stops
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No-longer works
reviews.comment: Used to be excellent, now seems to have stopped (although still works on my Samsung Galaxy Ace mobile, for some reason).  Anything to do with Android 4?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Was great, now stopped working on galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Stopped working all of a sudden and now doesn\'t do absolutely anything
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: It always freezes and it doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Manbir singh

reviews.title: xc
reviews.comment: alright
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bus number wraps round
reviews.comment: Not so good on smaller screens after latest update as 3 digit bus numbers don\'t fit in portrait mode, and they wrap round to next row. This ruins the simple design of previous versions. Please sort this out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine, but no map display
reviews.comment: Works fine if you know the bus stop, but would be better with a map display like several other apps offer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app but has stopped working on my Galaxy.  Sort it please as I miss it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic little app
reviews.comment: Does the job egregiously. Only flaw is that buses which have a three digits number are not properly formatted. Five stars nevertheless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good. Need accuracy!!
reviews.comment: Sometime it works like a charm. Most of the time shows wrong places. Need updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nt workin
reviews.comment: always not workin now? wait long time, but cant find bus stop?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: oh no!
reviews.comment: the service doesn\'t work anymore! Samsung galaxy s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app but it needs an option to search for bus stops
reviews.author: A Google User
